translations: v．刮（胡子、头发等）：用刀片或剃须刀去除（脸上、腿上等部位的）毛发。

phrs.translation: 侥幸的脱险；差一点发生的意外

sentences.sentence: How a man shaves may be a telling clue to his age.
sentences.translation: 一个男人如何刮脸也许会暴露他的实际年龄。

sentences.sentence: I can't quite believe the close shaves I've had just recently.
sentences.translation: 我几乎不能相信我最近刚经历的几次侥幸脱险。

sentences.sentence: "He who shaves, loses," said the Werder Bremen defender.
sentences.translation: 这位云达•不莱梅俱乐部的后卫说：“谁刮胡子谁就输。”
